entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
